specified-up.description: Configure an IP address pool to be exclusively used by a vBRAS-UP or UP backup policy profile in CU separation multi-instance scenarios.

occupied-policy.description: Configure a specific policy to specify the address pool to be occupied.
Specify a specific policy to specify the address pool to be occupied.

up-id.description: The specified address pool is exclusive to be used by vBRAS-UP UP ID.
Specify the ID of a vBRAS-UP.

up-backup-profile.description: The specified address pool is exclusive to be used by vBRAS-UP backup policy profile.
Specify the name of a vBRAS-UP backup policy profile.

hot-standby-up-group.description: The specified address pool is exclusive to be used by vBRAS-UP hot backup groups.

master-up.description: Specify the ID of the vBRAS-UP where the master interface in a vBRAS-UP hot backup group resides.

slave-up.description: Specify the ID of the vBRAS-UP where the slave interface in a vBRAS-UP hot backup group resides.

gateway.description: Configure the gateway and gate mask for the IP address pool.

gate-mask.description: Specify the subnet mask of the gateway.

vpn-instance.description: Specify the name of vpn-instance binded.

name.description: The name of vpn-instance binded.

dhcp-server-group.description: Bind a dhcp-server group to an IP address pool.

name.description: The dhcp-server group command associates the address pool with the DHCPv4 server group.

lease-management.description: Enables the lease management function for IP address pool.
Configure the lease management function for IP address pool.

enable.description: Enable/disable the lease management function for IP address pool.

common-config.description: The configuration for all type IP address pool.

export-route.description: Configure export host routes from the current address pool.

enable.description: Enable/disable export host routes from the current address pool.

unr-tag.description: Configure a route tag for an IP address pool.

value.description: Configure a route tag for an IP address pool.

items.description: Configure the IP address of DNS server.

time-default-config.description: Define the time include day hour and minute.

constant-index.description: Statistics of the constant index for an IPv4 address pool.
Statistics of the constant index for an IPv4 address pool.

value.description: The index of the IPv4 address pool.

total-number.description: The IP address total number of subnet segment.

used-number.description: The IP address used number of subnet segment.

idle-number.description: The IP address idle number of subnet segment.

conflict-number.description: The IP address conflict number of subnet segment.

disable-number.description: The IP address disable number of subnet segment.

reserved-number.description: The IP address reserved number of subnet segment.

static-bind-number.description: The IP address static-bind number of subnet segment.

total-number.description: The total number of IP address.

used-number.description: The used number of IP address.

ratio.description: The used ratio of IP address.

ip-pool-max-usage.description: The max usage of IP address.

total-number.description: The total number of IP address.

used-number.description: The used number of IP address.

time.description: Time when the maximum number of addresses were used.

lock.description: Configure an IP address pool lock so that the address pool cannot be used to assign IP addresses to new users.

drain.description: Enable/disable DHCP request messages for lease renewal from online users using the address pool are discarded.

name.description: Specify the name of the IP address pool.

type.description: Specify the type of the IP address pool.

local.description: Configure the information for the local IP address pool.

gateway.description: Configure the IP address pool gateway and gateMask. The gate-ip and gate-mask combinations of different pool instances cannot overlap.

sections.description: List of address segments in an IP address pool. The section address segments cannot have overlapping IP addresses.

section.description: Configure an address segment in an IP address pool. The section address segments cannot have overlapping IP addresses.

start-ip-address.description: Specify the start IP address of the address segment in the dotted decimal format.

end-ip-address.description: Specify the end IP address of the address segment in the dotted decimal format.

end-ip-address.description: Specify the end IP address which must be in the IP address segment specified in the section.

dhcp-server-group.description: Configure to bind a dhcp-server group to an IP address pool.

lease.description: Configure lease of IP pool, include day, hour and minute.

reserved-ip-address.description: Configure the reservation type of an IP address for a user, either leased-based IP address reservation or MAC-address-based IP address reservation.

type.description: Specify the type of reserved IP address.

remote.description: Configure the information for the remote IP address pool.

gateway.description: Configure the gate IP address and gate mask for the remote IP address pool. The gate-ip and gate-mask combinations of different pool instances cannot overlap.

excluded-ip-addresss.description: List of range of IP addresses that do not take part in automatic address assignment.

excluded-ip-address.description: Configure the range of IP addresses that do not take part in automatic address assignment.

start-ip-address.description: Specify the start IP address which must be in the IP address segment specified in the gateway.

end-ip-address.description: Specify the end IP address which must be in the IP address segment specified in the gateway.

dhcp-server-group.description: Configure an IP address pool bound to a dhcp-server group.

ip-loose-check.description: Configure a BRAS checking whether the IP addresses assigned by the DHCP server are on the network segment to which the gateway address of the remote address pool belongs.

reserved-ip-address.description: Configure the reservation type of an IP address for a user, only leased-based IP address reservation.

type.description: Specify the type of reserved IP address.

dynamic.description: Configure the information for the dynamic IP address pool.

dap-server.description: Configure a DAP resource pool to assign address segments to a BRAS.

name.description: Specify the name of a DAP resource pool.

subnet-length.description: Configure a mask length for the initial and extended address segment.

initial.description: Specify a mask length for the initial address segment.

extend.description: Specify a mask length for the extend address segment.

lease.description: Configure lease of IP pool, include day, hour and minute.

detect-interval.description: Configure the number of retransmission times and a retransmission interval for detecting address segment availability in a dynamic address pool.

retransmit-times.description: Specify the number of retransmission times.

bind-radius-server-group.description: Configure a dynamic address pool bound to a RADIUS server group.

name.description: Specify a RADIUS server group for a dynamic address pool.

used-threshold.description: Configure upper and lower address usage thresholds of a dynamic address pool.

upper-limit.description: Specify an upper threshold for address segment application, in percentage.

lower-limit.description: Specify a lower threshold for address segment release, in percentage. lower-limit must be smaller than upper-limit.

authentication.description: Configure an authentication name and a password for the BRAS to apply to a RADIUS server for dynamic address segments.

name.description: Specify an authentication name used for applying for dynamic address segments.

password.description: The password is a string ranging from 1 to 16 characters for a simple password or 1 to 128 characters for a ciphertext password.

subnet-segments.description: List of statistics for dynamic IP address pool.

subnet-segment.description: Get the subnet total statistics for dynamic IP address pool.

subnet-index.description: The subnet index of dynamic pool.

start-ip-address.description: The start IP address of subnet segment.

end-ip-address.description: The end IP address of subnet segment.

pool-statistic.description: Get the statistics for IP address pool.

pool-index.description: The index of IP address pool.

total-idle-number.description: The total number of idle IP address.

time-out-count.description: The number of no responses from the address pool.

blocked-time.description: The number of times that the address pool is isolated.

name.description: Specify the name of an address pool group.

bind-pools.description: Configure the address pool used by the IP pool-group or changes the ID of the address pool.

items.description: Configure the name of the IP address pool bound to IP pool group.

auto-refresh.description: Configure the ip-pool route auto-refresh disable command disables auto-refresh of address pool routes.

enable.description: Enable/disable auto-refresh of address pool routes.

ip-unr-route-tag.description: Configure route tags for IPv4 users.

local-pool-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated by an IPv4 local address pool.

framed-route-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated based on the Framed-Route attribute delivered by the RADIUS server.

framed-ip-netmask-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated based on the IP-Netmask attribute delivered by the RADIUS server.

framed-ip-address-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the host route generated based on the IPv4 address delivered by the RADIUS server.

remote-pool-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated by an IPv4 remote address pool.

dynamic-pool-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated by an IPv4 dynamic address pool.

pool-select-algorithm.description: Configure an algorithm to device which IP address pool to online users.

local-round-robin.description: Enable/disable the round robin algorithm for local IP address pool.

remote-algorithm.description: The algorithm for remote IP address pool.

remote-round-robin.description: Configure the round robin algorithm for remote IP address pool.
The round robin algorithm for remote IP address pool.

remote-loading-share.description: Configure the restrain period and timeout threshold to select the IP address pool according to the weight algorithm.
Enable/disable the restrain period and timeout threshold to select the IP address pool according to the weight algorithm.

dhcp-decline.description: Configure the action taken by the NE40E on the user IP address after the device receives a DHCP decline packet from the user.

enable.description: Enable/disable the function to configure a constant index for the IPv4 address pool.

remote-id-strip.description: Configure the functional strip remote-id of Option 82 in dhcp request packet.

enable.description: Enable/disable the functional strip remote-id of Option 82 in dhcp request packet.

frame-ip-reply-option82.description: Configure a device to insert Option 82 attributes into Offer and ACK messages.

enable.description: Enable/disable a device to insert Option 82 attributes into Offer and ACK messages.

auto-block.description: Configure automatic isolation of address pools.

enable.description: Enable/disable automatic isolation of address pools.

slave-switch.description: Enable/disable the active/standby switchover function for IPv4 address pool isolation.

pool-usage-statistics.description: List of usage statistics for all IPv4 address pools, including the local and remote address pools.

pool-usage-statistic.description: Display the usage statistics for all IPv4 address pools, including the local and remote address pools.

total-num.description: Total number of IPv4 addresses in the pool.

used-num.description: Number of used IPv4 addresses in the pool.

ratio.description: Usage of the IPv4 address pool of the pool.

global-statistic.description: Get the total statistics for IP address pool.

idle-number.description: Number of idle addresses on the equipment.

used-number.description: Number of addresses in use on the equipment.

conflict-number.description: Number of conflicting addresses on the equipment.

exclude-number.description: Number of excluded addresses on the equipment.

total-number.description: The total number of IP address.

used-percent.description: The percent of used IP address.

domain-name.description: Specify the name of a domain.

upid-statistics.description: List of IP address by UP ID statistics.

upid-statistic.description: IP address by UP ID statistics.

max-usage.description: Display historical maximum usage statistics for IPv4 addresses base on domain.

cu-max-usages.description: List of usage statistics for IPv4 addresses base on domain.

cu-max-usage.description: Display historical maximum usage statistics for IPv4 addresses base on domain.

usage-status.description: Display statistics for public IP address pool status in a specified domain.

pool-status.description:
Public IP address pool status can be 0, 1, or 2.
If the IP address pool usage is greater than the lower threshold and less than the upper threshold, the value is 1 (warning).
If the IP address pool usage is greater than or equal to the upper threshold, the value is 2 (danger).

cu-usage-statuss.description: List of statistics for public IP address pool status in a specified domain.

cu-usage-status.description: Display statistics for public IP address pool status in a specified domain.

pool-status.description:
Public IP address pool status can be 0, 1, or 2.
If the IP address pool usage is greater than the lower threshold and less than the upper threshold, the value is 1 (warning).
If the IP address pool usage is greater than or equal to the upper threshold, the value is 2 (danger).

ip-loose-check_schema.description: Configure a BRAS checking whether the IP addresses assigned by the DHCP server are on the network segment to which the gateway address of the remote address pool belongs.

dynamic_schema.description: Configure the information for the dynamic IP address pool.

dap-server.description: Configure a DAP resource pool to assign address segments to a BRAS.

name.description: Specify the name of a DAP resource pool.

subnet-length.description: Configure a mask length for the initial and extended address segment.

initial.description: Specify a mask length for the initial address segment.

extend.description: Specify a mask length for the extend address segment.

lease.description: Configure lease of IP pool, include day, hour and minute.

detect-interval.description: Configure the number of retransmission times and a retransmission interval for detecting address segment availability in a dynamic address pool.

retransmit-times.description: Specify the number of retransmission times.

bind-radius-server-group.description: Configure a dynamic address pool bound to a RADIUS server group.

name.description: Specify a RADIUS server group for a dynamic address pool.

used-threshold.description: Configure upper and lower address usage thresholds of a dynamic address pool.

upper-limit.description: Specify an upper threshold for address segment application, in percentage.

lower-limit.description: Specify a lower threshold for address segment release, in percentage. lower-limit must be smaller than upper-limit.

authentication.description: Configure an authentication name and a password for the BRAS to apply to a RADIUS server for dynamic address segments.

name.description: Specify an authentication name used for applying for dynamic address segments.

password.description: The password is a string ranging from 1 to 16 characters for a simple password or 1 to 128 characters for a ciphertext password.

subnet-segments.description: List of statistics for dynamic IP address pool.

subnet-segment.description: Get the subnet total statistics for dynamic IP address pool.

subnet-index.description: The subnet index of dynamic pool.

start-ip-address.description: The start IP address of subnet segment.

end-ip-address.description: The end IP address of subnet segment.

name.description: Specify the name of a DAP resource pool.

extend.description: Specify a mask length for the extend address segment.

subnet-segments_schema.description: List of statistics for dynamic IP address pool.

subnet-segment.description: Get the subnet total statistics for dynamic IP address pool.

subnet-index.description: The subnet index of dynamic pool.

start-ip-address.description: The start IP address of subnet segment.

end-ip-address.description: The end IP address of subnet segment.

subnet-index.description: The subnet index of dynamic pool.

start-ip-address.description: The start IP address of subnet segment.

end-ip-address.description: The end IP address of subnet segment.

pool-statistic_schema.description: Get the statistics for IP address pool.

pool-index.description: The index of IP address pool.

total-idle-number.description: The total number of idle IP address.

time-out-count.description: The number of no responses from the address pool.

blocked-time.description: The number of times that the address pool is isolated.

name.description: Specify the name of an address pool group.

bind-pools.description: Configure the address pool used by the IP pool-group or changes the ID of the address pool.

items.description: Configure the name of the IP address pool bound to IP pool group.

name.description: Specify the name of an address pool group.

bind-pools.description: Configure the address pool used by the IP pool-group or changes the ID of the address pool.

items.description: Configure the name of the IP address pool bound to IP pool group.

bind-pools_schema.description: Configure the address pool used by the IP pool-group or changes the ID of the address pool.

items.description: Configure the name of the IP address pool bound to IP pool group.

auto-refresh_schema.description: Configure the ip-pool route auto-refresh disable command disables auto-refresh of address pool routes.

enable.description: Enable/disable auto-refresh of address pool routes.

ip-unr-route-tag_schema.description: Configure route tags for IPv4 users.

local-pool-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated by an IPv4 local address pool.

framed-route-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated based on the Framed-Route attribute delivered by the RADIUS server.

framed-ip-netmask-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated based on the IP-Netmask attribute delivered by the RADIUS server.

framed-ip-address-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the host route generated based on the IPv4 address delivered by the RADIUS server.

remote-pool-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated by an IPv4 remote address pool.

dynamic-pool-tag.description: Specify the route tag of the network segment generated by an IPv4 dynamic address pool.

pool-select-algorithm_schema.description: Configure an algorithm to device which IP address pool to online users.

local-round-robin.description: Enable/disable the round robin algorithm for local IP address pool.

remote-algorithm.description: The algorithm for remote IP address pool.

remote-round-robin.description: Configure the round robin algorithm for remote IP address pool.
The round robin algorithm for remote IP address pool.

remote-loading-share.description: Configure the restrain period and timeout threshold to select the IP address pool according to the weight algorithm.
Enable/disable the restrain period and timeout threshold to select the IP address pool according to the weight algorithm.

remote-loading-share_schema.description: Enable/disable the restrain period and timeout threshold to select the IP address pool according to the weight algorithm.

dhcp-decline_schema.description: Configure the action taken by the NE40E on the user IP address after the device receives a DHCP decline packet from the user.

remote-id-strip_schema.description: Configure the functional strip remote-id of Option 82 in dhcp request packet.

enable.description: Enable/disable the functional strip remote-id of Option 82 in dhcp request packet.

frame-ip-reply-option82_schema.description: Configure a device to insert Option 82 attributes into Offer and ACK messages.

enable.description: Enable/disable a device to insert Option 82 attributes into Offer and ACK messages.

auto-block_schema.description: Configure automatic isolation of address pools.

enable.description: Enable/disable automatic isolation of address pools.

slave-switch.description: Enable/disable the active/standby switchover function for IPv4 address pool isolation.

pool-usage-statistics_schema.description: List of usage statistics for all IPv4 address pools, including the local and remote address pools.

pool-usage-statistic.description: Display the usage statistics for all IPv4 address pools, including the local and remote address pools.

total-num.description: Total number of IPv4 addresses in the pool.

used-num.description: Number of used IPv4 addresses in the pool.

ratio.description: Usage of the IPv4 address pool of the pool.

total-num.description: Total number of IPv4 addresses in the pool.

used-num.description: Number of used IPv4 addresses in the pool.

ratio.description: Usage of the IPv4 address pool of the pool.

global-statistic_schema.description: Get the total statistics for IP address pool.

idle-number.description: Number of idle addresses on the equipment.

used-number.description: Number of addresses in use on the equipment.

conflict-number.description: Number of conflicting addresses on the equipment.

exclude-number.description: Number of excluded addresses on the equipment.

total-number.description: The total number of IP address.

used-percent.description: The percent of used IP address.

domain-name.description: Specify the name of a domain.

upid-statistics.description: List of IP address by UP ID statistics.

upid-statistic.description: IP address by UP ID statistics.

max-usage.description: Display historical maximum usage statistics for IPv4 addresses base on domain.

cu-max-usages.description: List of usage statistics for IPv4 addresses base on domain.

cu-max-usage.description: Display historical maximum usage statistics for IPv4 addresses base on domain.

usage-status.description: Display statistics for public IP address pool status in a specified domain.

pool-status.description:
Public IP address pool status can be 0, 1, or 2.
If the IP address pool usage is greater than the lower threshold and less than the upper threshold, the value is 1 (warning).
If the IP address pool usage is greater than or equal to the upper threshold, the value is 2 (danger).
